title: [Thystorye and lyf of the noble and crysten prynce Charles the grete kynge of Frauuce [sic]]
author: Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.
publicationStmtPublisher: And the yere of our lord M CCCC lxxxv, and enprynted the fyrst day of decembre the same yere of our lord .. Explicit p[er] William Caxton,
